00044 static const char *me = NULL;
00045 static bool quiet = false;
00046 static cvq *vq = NULL;

00048 /*
00049  *
00050  */
00051 void usage()
00052 {
00053     cerr<<"usage: "<<me<< " [-q] [-s] (e-mail password){1,}"<<endl
00054         <<"\t-s\tstdin mode - read e-mail addresses and passwords from stdin"<<endl
00055         <<"\t-l\tdon't check whether login is disallowed"<<endl
00056         <<"\t-q\tquiet mode"<<endl
00057         <<endl
00058         <<"Program adds users. Default action is to read users and passwords"<<endl
00059         <<"from command line, check if login is allowed. In stdin mode"<<endl
00060         <<"programs input should be 2 lines for each mailbox: e-email, password."<<endl;
00061 }

00063 /*
00064  *
00065  */
00066 bool user_add(const string &e, const string &p, uint8_t flags)
00067 {
00068     string u, d;
00069     string::size_type atpos;
00070     
00071     if(!quiet) cout<<e<<": ";
00072     if( (atpos=e.find('@')) == string::npos
00073         || (u = e.substr(0,atpos)).empty()
00074         || (d = e.substr(atpos+1)).empty() ) {
00075             if(!quiet)
00076                     cout<<"invalid e-mail"<<endl;
00077             return quiet;
00078     }
00079     char ret;
00080     if((ret=vq->user_add(u,d,p,flags))) {
00081             if(!quiet)
00082                     cout<<vq->err_report()<<endl;
00083             return quiet;
00084     } else {
00085             if(!quiet)
00086                     cout<<"user was added."<<endl;
00087     }
00088     return 0;
00089 }

00093 int main(int ac, char **av)
00094 {
00095     me = *av;
00096     try {
00097             int opt;
00098             bool sin = false;
00099             uint8_t flags=0;
00100             while( (opt=getopt(ac,av,"sqhl")) != -1 ) {
00101                     switch(opt) {
00102                     case 's':
00103                             sin = true;
00104                             break;
00105                     case 'q':
00106                             quiet=true;
00107                             break;
00108                     case 'l':
00109                             flags |= 1;
00110                             break;
00111                     default:        
00112                     case '?':
00113                     case 'h':
00114                             usage();
00115                             return(1);
00116                     }
00117             }
00118             if( ! sin && optind >= ac ) {
00119                     usage();
00120                     return(1);
00121             }
00122             ac -= optind;
00123             av += optind;
00124             if( ! sin && ac % 2 ) {
00125                     usage();
00126                     return(1);
00127             }
00128 
00129             vq = cvq::alloc();
00130             
00131             if( sin ) {
00132                     string e,p;
00133                     do {
00134                             if( ! quiet ) {
00135                                     cout << "E-mail: ";
00136                                     cout.flush();
00137                             }
00138                             if( ! getline(cin,e) ) break;
00139                             if( ! quiet ) {
00140                                     cout << "Password: ";
00141                                     cout.flush();
00142                             }
00143                             if( ! getline(cin,p) ) break;
00144                             if( user_add(e,p,flags) ) return 1;
00145                     } while(cin);
00146             } else {
00147                     if(quiet) ac=1;
00148                     for(int i=0; i < ac; i+=2 ) {
00149                             if( user_add(av[i], av[i+1], flags) )
00150                                     return 1;
00151                     }
00152             }
00153     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00154             cerr << "exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00155             return 1;
00156     }
00157     return 0;
00158 }
